allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add GeminiGen Brain - AI-powered 5-step storyboard pipeline

Added brain selection system with two processing modes:
- Storyboard Brain (existing fast logic)
- GeminiGen Brain (new AI-powered pipeline)

Pipeline steps:
1. Character Identification - Extract all characters with 20+ attributes
2. Environment Identification - Extract all environments with detailed descriptions
3. Script to Paragraph Splitting - AI-driven paragraph generation
4. Paragraph to Scene Generation - Create cinematic scenes per paragraph
5. Scene to Frame Prompts - Generate start/end frame prompts

Features:
- Brain selection modal on Page 1
- Tag-based parsing for structured GeminiGen responses
- Webhook polling for async AI processing
- Credits tracking and breakdown display
- Page 2 displays extracted characters/environments
- State management for all pipeline data
- Progress callbacks for real-time updates

Files:
- Created: v2/geminigen-brain.js (complete pipeline implementation)
- Modified: v2/state-manager.js (new storage methods)
- Modified: v2/index.html (brain selection UI & integration)
- Modified: v2/page2.html (display extracted data & credits)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Phase 3: Authentication Backend Implementation

Complete authentication system with JWT tokens and HttpOnly cookies:

Backend Services:
- app/services/AuthService.php: JWT generation, validation, cookie management
- app/services/EmailService.php: SMTP email with verification & reset templates
- app/models/User.php: User CRUD, credit management, token operations
- app/middlewares/AuthMiddleware.php: JWT verification for protected routes
- app/middlewares/AdminMiddleware.php: Admin role verification

API Endpoints \(/api/auth/\):
- signup.php: User registration with email validation
- login.php: JWT authentication with remember-me option
- logout.php: Session invalidation and cookie clearing
- verify-email.php: Email verification with 20 credit signup bonus
- forgot-password.php: Password reset request \(1-hour expiry\)
- reset-password.php: Password reset with token validation
- resend-verification.php: Resend verification email
- check.php: Auth status check for frontend
- me.php: Get current user data

Security Features:
- bcrypt password hashing \(cost 12\)
- HMAC-SHA256 JWT signing
- HttpOnly + SameSite=Strict cookies
- Token expiry \(24h access, 7d refresh\)
- Email enumeration prevention
- Session invalidation on password reset

Database Schema:
- init.sql already contains users, sessions, credits tables

Documentation:
- docs/USER-EXPERIENCE-BLUEPRINT.md: Tool flow documentation

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add cache-busting query strings to JS files to bypass Cloudflare CDN cache

Added ?v=2.0 to all auth.js and common.js references in HTML files
to force browsers to download the updated JavaScript files with the
correct /public API paths instead of serving cached old versions.

Fix error message display for API validation errors

- Updated auth.js to properly parse validation errors from API response
- API returns errors in ''errors'' object and ''message'' field, not ''error''
- Now shows specific validation messages \(e.g., "Email already exists"\)
- Bumped cache version to v=2.1

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add admin GeminiGen API key assignment and fix pagination

- Add GeminiGen API key assignment feature for admin:
  - New ðŸ”‘ button in user actions column
  - Modal to assign/update API keys for users
  - Email notification when API key is assigned
  - New email template for API key notification

- Fix admin users page pagination:

  - Return proper pagination object with from/to/pages
  - Add generation_count to user list query

- Add dummy data for YouTube Story Generator pages:
  - All pages \(2-6\) now accessible directly via URL
  - DummyData helper initializes test data when needed
  - Shows "Test Mode" toast when using dummy data

- Add admin-only close button for API validation modal:
